scientificFacts.fact: Tardigrades can survive temperatures as low as -272¬∞C (near absolute zero) and as high as 150¬∞C
scientificFacts.gameRelevance: Justifies extreme temperature testing in Chapter 2

scientificFacts.fact: 68% of tardigrades survived 10 days of space exposure on the FOTON-M3 mission in 2007
scientificFacts.gameRelevance: Basis for NASA partnership and space mission chapters

scientificFacts.fact: Tardigrades can lose up to 99% of their body water and survive decades in this state
scientificFacts.gameRelevance: Explains cryptobiosis mechanism central to game narrative

scientificFacts.fact: The DSUP (Damage Suppressor) protein is unique to tardigrades and protects DNA from damage
scientificFacts.gameRelevance: Scientific basis for genetic research path in Chapter 3

scientificFacts.fact: Tardigrades can withstand radiation doses 1000 times higher than what would kill humans
scientificFacts.gameRelevance: Justifies radiation protection applications for Mars missions
